columns.name: id
columns.comment: unique id

columns.name: type
columns.comment: only one type at present: package set (pkgset)

columns.name: created
columns.comment: unix time in millis of creation; immutable

columns.name: state_updated
columns.comment: unix time in millis of last state change

columns.name: main_package_id
columns.comment: id of main package, used by pkggrp rows only

columns.name: devset_id
columns.comment: id of devset, used by pkggrp rows only

columns.name: priority
columns.comment: priority of package source

columns.name: id
columns.comment: unique id

columns.name: parent_id
columns.comment: unique id of parent filterable tree node

columns.name: public_id_w0
columns.comment: generated public id, first 64 bit word

columns.name: public_id_w1
columns.comment: generated public id, second 64 bit word

columns.name: is_foundation
columns.comment: Is this a foundation node? Otherwise is a content node.

columns.name: is_content_subtree_head
columns.comment: Is this a content subtree head?

columns.name: content_source_id
columns.comment: id of content source

columns.name: resource_id
columns.comment: id of resource; content (i.e. non-foundation) nodes only

columns.name: descendant_count
columns.comment: unfiltered countable descendant node count; content (i.e. non-foundation) nodes only

columns.name: parent_sort
columns.comment: parent node's sort (on child not parent as optimization)

columns.name: leaf_order
columns.comment: order based on a) whether or not node is a leaf and b) whether its parent node resource allows leaf-based sorting of its children

columns.name: custom_order
columns.comment: custom explicit order provided by BU

columns.name: implicit_order
columns.comment: implicit order based on resource position within metadata

columns.name: resource_type
columns.comment: resource's type; copied from resource for performance

columns.name: file_type
columns.comment: resource's file_type; copied from resource for performance

columns.name: package_id
columns.comment: id of resource's source package; copied from resource for performance

columns.name: link_ext
columns.comment: link extension; derived from resource.link for performance

columns.name: link_type
columns.comment: derived from resource.link_type, 'e' for external, 'l' for local; copied for performance

columns.name: view_limitations
columns.comment: Array of view limitations as a comma separated string

columns.name: readme_public_id_w0
columns.comment: readme node's generated public id, first 64 bit word

columns.name: readme_public_id_w1
columns.comment: readme node's public id, second 64 bit word

columns.name: id
columns.comment: unique id

columns.name: name
columns.comment: shortened from 255 due to 767 byte key length limit

columns.name: name_search
columns.comment: for case insensitive comparison

columns.name: device_id
columns.comment: id of the filter's device, if this is a device filter

columns.name: devtool_id
columns.comment: id of the filter's devtool, if this is a devtool filter

chunks.comment: filter substrings that trees can be filtered on

columns.name: id
columns.comment: unique id

columns.name: chunk
columns.comment: shortened from 255 due to 767 byte key length limit

trailing_subchunks.comment: trailing sub-chunks of a filter's chunk

columns.name: chunk_id
columns.comment: id of filter chunk

columns.name: subchunk
columns.comment: subchunk of the filter's chunk

columns.name: filter_id
columns.comment: id of the chunk's filter

columns.name: chunk_id
columns.comment: id of the chunk

columns.name: chunk_type
columns.comment: chunk type: (s)imple, (c)omposite, (f)ull, frequent (x)

columns.name: search_on_filter
columns.comment: Filter is to be used when searching on chunk

columns.name: filter_segment
columns.comment: segment of filter in original case corresponding to the chunk

columns.name: filter_type
columns.comment: (d)evice, devtool-(b)oard, dev(t)ool-other, ta(g), (e)num, (k)eyword, freq-chunk (x)

columns.name: is_node_counted
columns.comment: true if the node is included in the count of its ancestors' descendants; duplicate of resources.is_counted

columns.name: id
columns.comment: unique id

columns.name: devset_id
columns.comment: id of devset that device belongs to

columns.name: id
columns.comment: unique id

columns.name: devset_id
columns.comment: id of devset that devtool belongs to

devtool_devices.comment: many-to-many associative table linking devtools with the devices that they support

columns.name: id
columns.comment: unique id

columns.name: id
columns.comment: unique db id

columns.name: package_id
columns.comment: dependent package's db id

columns.name: id
columns.comment: unique id

columns.name: parent_id
columns.comment: id of parent resource

columns.name: package_id
columns.comment: id of source package

columns.name: custom_order
columns.comment: custom explicit order provided by BU

columns.name: implicit_order
columns.comment: implicit order based on resource position within metadata

columns.name: view_limitations
columns.comment: Array of view limitations as a comma separated string

columns.name: proj_restriction
columns.comment: 'c' for cloud-only, 'd' for desktop-only

columns.name: kernel
columns.comment: Array of kernels for an example as a comma separated string

columns.name: compiler
columns.comment: Array of compilers for an example as a comma separated string

columns.name: override_projspec_device
columns.comment: Used at the time of import to override the project spec deviced Id

columns.name: is_counted
columns.comment: true if the resource is included in the tree descendant counts

resource_devices.comment: many-to-many associative table linking resources with their supported devices

columns.name: public_id_w0
columns.comment: public id, first 64 bit word

columns.name: public_id_w1
columns.comment: public id, second 64 bit word

columns.name: alias
columns.comment: Is this public id an alias (or primary)?

columns.name: node_id
columns.comment: node's id

columns.name: package_group_id
columns.comment: id of package group to which the node belongs

columns.name: custom_resource_public_id
columns.comment: a public id (may or may not be unique) assigned to the node's resource

columns.name: global
columns.comment: Is the public id global or package-scoped?

columns.name: alias
columns.comment: Is the public id an alias?

indexes.comment: primary key, optimized for lookup on custom_resource_public_id

columns.name: alias
columns.comment: a device alias

columns.name: public_id
columns.comment: the device's unique public id

indexes.comment: primary key, optimized for alias -> public id lookup w/o devset

columns.name: alias
columns.comment: a devtool alias

columns.name: public_id
columns.comment: the devtool's unique public id

indexes.comment: primary key, optimized for alias -> public id lookup w/o devset

columns.name: alias
columns.comment: a package alias

resource_devtools.comment: many-to-many associative table linking resources with their supported devtools

filter_affects_node.comment: Content Sources X their Nodes X the Filters that apply to them (directly and indirectly)

columns.name: source_id
columns.comment: Content Source ID; from the Content Head Node's source

columns.name: is_node_counted
columns.comment: true if the node is included in count of its ancestors' child nodes; duplicate of resources.is_counted

columns.name: relationship
columns.comment: 'd' direct, 'a' ancestor of node, 'c' descendant of node

filter_affects_node_cdesc.comment: Content Sources X their Nodes X their countable descendant Nodes X the Filters that apply to them (directly and indirectly)

node_dev_resgrps.comment: Nodes X Resource Groups under node X Resource Group's Devs. For resource group lookup on node + dev.

columns.name: is_devtool
columns.comment: devtool or device?

columns.name: dev_id
columns.comment: polymorphic association to devices and devtools

res_filters.comment: Countable Resources X Filters that apply to them (directly or indirectly)

columns.name: resource_grp
columns.comment: path from json db, for logging/debugging

columns.name: file_type
columns.comment: resource's file_type; copied from resource for performance

columns.name: package_id
columns.comment: id of resource's source package; copied from resource for performance

columns.name: link_ext
columns.comment: link extension; derived from resource.link for performance

columns.name: link_type
columns.comment: derived from resource.link_type, 'e' for external, 'l' for local; copied for performance

columns.name: view_limitations
columns.comment: Array of view limitations as a comma separated string

resgrp_nodes.comment: Table view resource groups X their nodes

columns.name: is_devtool
columns.comment: devtool or device?

columns.name: dev_id
columns.comment: polymorphic association to devices and devtools

columns.name: has_readme
columns.comment: Does node have readme?

columns.name: has_children
columns.comment: Does node have children?
